html:
2025-0536
2025-06-26172024ESDC, FINBudget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1Order Fixing the Day After the Day on Which this Order is Made as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1 Come into Force Order fixing the day after the day on which section 162, subsection 163(2), sections 166 to 168, subsection 169(1) and section 170 of the of the Budget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1, come into force in order to allow the Minister of Employment and Social Development Canada to begin to establish a regime to implement automatic enrolment to the Canada Learning Bond for eligible children.N/A
subject: Order Fixing the Day After the Day on Which this Order is Made as the Day on Which Certain Provisions of the Budget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1 Come into Force
precis: Order fixing the day after the day on which section 162, subsection 163(2), sections 166 to 168, subsection 169(1) and section 170 of the of the Budget Implementation Act, 2024, No. 1, come into force in order to allow the Minister of Employment and Social Development Canada to begin to establish a regime to implement automatic enrolment to the Canada Learning Bond for eligible children.
